title: An Apple for the Teacher
description: A professional's struggle between romance and duty, based on a true story After a happy childhood, high academic achievement and national sporting success, the only missing part of Alan Bentley's life is love, which despite his best efforts always seems to elude him. But now Alan has secured a coveted teaching post at an acclaimed Sixth Form College. Could romantic interest unexpectedly emerge from such a position, to the point where it plays havoc with his moral conscience and professional integrity? An Apple for the Teacher chronicles an emotive ten-year period in Alan Bentley's life, a time when naivety and human fallibility lead to a blurring of the lines between his professional responsibilities and private aspirations. In a rapidly changing society, he finds himself increasingly out of his depth.
author: A.C. Bentley
